description: Allegra’s Pizza is the mobile extension of one of the most celebrated Italian restaurants in The Mile High City!Chef & Owner Tony has taken the traditions and recipes of his Naples-born grandparents to craft a sensational selection of pizza, pasta, salads, and more. The dough is hand-tossed and baked to perfection in his vintage hearth ovens. The toppings are of the freshest and finest variety. Each item on the menu has been personally approved by Tony’s toughest critic: his daughter Allegra, so be assured that you’re tasting the best creations yet. If you’re craving deliciousness for your next meal or event, with its incredible flavor and friendly service, Allegra’s Pizza is the top truck for you and your guests.
name: Allegra's Pizza
